title: So can anyone tell me how the f is evelynn op?
body: Title. I mean riot said Evelynn's burst is too damn high. I mean isnt this natural?  She has to walk over to the enemies to deal any sort of dmg ( her e hardly counts as dash). And she cant do that with ease thanks to the big ass detection radius. I mean late game i expect a evelynn to deal shit tons of dmg in the expense of how easy for her is to engage to someone.

replies.body: Because she's an AP assassin, she's not allowed to assassinate the beloved marksmen who are farming alone far away from their team{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
The only logical comment here
This is probably the first time I have seen a thread where the Op is asking a question and then refuses most answers given because of a lack of replays

Again just because she can one shot, doesnt mean she is op.  Veigar can one shot but he aint op.  Talon can one shot but he isnt that oppressive. Or rather talon can one shot, but he doesnt have a detection radius like evelynn.

I was playing a long game last night with an Eve that just appeared out of nowhere and oneshot the ADC. About a dozen times.

Zero warning. Zero counterplay. Zero skill.

Like it or not, that means the adc was 1) caught out 2) not a good player and 3) didn't pink ward.
 

Evelynn can't really do that until VERY late game except on Electrocute (and Eletrocute falls off as games go on and Evelynn becomes late game obsolete).

So by making that argument, you're actually saying that 1) my game went too long or 2) Electrocute is OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Azadethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2018-01-24T21:42:41.660+0000)
>
> Like it or not, that means the adc was 1) caught out 2) not a good player and 3) didn't pink ward.
>  
> 
> Evelynn can't really do that until VERY late game except on Electrocute (and Eletrocute falls off as games go on and Evelynn becomes late game obsolete).
> 
> So by making that argument, you're actually saying that 1) my game went too long or 2) Electrocute is OP.

The game was 50 minutes, and the ADC was fine. Pink wards dont do shit against eve, especially once laning phase ends. You cant ward everything.

By the time they had 3-4 kills, they just oneshot people under tower or while walking to lane. Jungler spotting them did zero good, because they just oneshot the jungler as well.

In other words, you're crying about a 1000 AP Evelynn erasing an adc's HP which more or less doesn't grow an entire game, because you let the game drag on.

Why shouldn't Evelynn kill in 2 seconds at that point when adcs do it all the time, as do all other assassins? It's an Adc.

P.S. pro teams buy ~25 pinks vs Evelynn a game. It slows her down at the least, and at least flags in what direction she's heading. If placed correctly, it also creates a battleground to kill her at, because she doesn't see the ward until it's too late (hiding inside the same bush as a Pink = dead Eve)

> [{quoted}](name=Azadethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=0002000100000001,timestamp=2018-01-24T22:57:25.283+0000)
>
> In other words, you're crying about a 1000 AP Evelynn erasing an adc's HP which more or less doesn't grow an entire game, because you let the game drag on.
> 
> Why shouldn't Evelynn kill in 2 seconds at that point when adcs do it all the time, as do all other assassins? It's an Adc.
> 
> P.S. pro teams buy ~25 pinks vs Evelynn a game. It slows her down at the least, and at least flags in what direction she's heading. If placed correctly, it also creates a battleground to kill her at, because she doesn't see the ward until it's too late (hiding inside the same bush as a Pink = dead Eve)

I am fairly sure 1000 ap is not possible, let alone around 15 minutes.

Defend it all you want, but the winrate speaks for itself. No amount of semantics will stop it being gutted.

I get over 1100 by going {{item:3165}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3110}}  As a final build (Yes sans jungle and shoes..... if game drags on long enough.

On Sorcery with Transcendence and Eyeball collection, that's 1058 AP at 40 minutes. with Baron over 1100, almost 1200.

At that point, her ult's minimum damage is over 1800 and low HP damage 3600. Her E did about 90% hp damage.

But that's VERY late game, very expensive, hard to achieve, and usually you should have ended a game by then.

I could technically get more AP if I didn't have the Frozen Heart, which gives me only 52 AP. A Banshee's Veil or a Zhonya's would put me higher, but also at the cost of some armor..... Personally when a game is that long, I want to be able to 1v5, and Frozen Heart allows me to live long enough to reach adcs, kill them, back out, regen to fulll HP and cycle the next target.

He said his game was 50 minutes, not 15. He being you.
Replay or you are exaggerating.

> [{quoted}](name=VanaQuish,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-24T22:23:02.082+0000)
>
> Replay or you are exaggerating.

You can open the history just as easily as i can.
I said replay of what you said. Not of the game. I can see in a game an Evelynn fed. What i want is a replay tho.

> [{quoted}](name=VanaQuish,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=000200010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-25T10:32:24.231+0000)
>
> I said replay of what you said. Not of the game. I can see in a game an Evelynn fed. What i want is a replay tho.

Words cannot express how disinterested i am in wasting an hour of my life recording a replay, and another 5-6 hours uploading it, just so i can prove to a salty kid that their favorite champion is fucking busted.

Nerfs go on, regardless of what you think.
Then dont come complain. AND AGAIN  the point of this thread is for someone to explain to me what makes evelynn have SUCH A BIG WINRATE.

> [{quoted}](name=VanaQuish,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=00020001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-25T21:24:11.730+0000)
>
>  AND AGAIN  the point of this thread is for someone to explain to me what makes evelynn have SUCH A BIG WINRATE.

About half a dozen people did, but you dont want to hear it.
Wait wait what? This doesnt even make sense at this point. Im starting to think that you are a troll. Wtf are you talking about. xD

> [{quoted}](name=VanaQuish,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gxZaMpcT,comment-id=0002000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-26T05:14:01.558+0000)
>
> Wait wait what? This doesnt even make sense at this point. Im starting to think that you are a troll. Wtf are you talking about. xD

Reading comprehension barely above the bar for literacy? Call someone a troll, that will help.
Replay or you are exaggerating.

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/diamond/plus/champion/Evelynn/Jungle/

"Dude Riot why are you nerfing one of the best junglers in the game come on"
You are missing the point. The point of this thread is for someone to tell me what makes her such a good jungler/champion.

Her Q dashes for her considering it charms them.

Her damage was absolutely ridiculous and deserved the gutting

1st of all. Her q cant charm. Her q can proc the mark so it charms. 
2nd of all.  Didnt you read what i said? She is the the only assassin in the damn game that has to walk OVER to the target to kill him. All other assassins have dashes. ( Her q wont proc the charm against any decent player far to easy to sidestep or to flat out run away from. She is also the only assassin that has to wait that damn 2.5 sec ( her charm ) to get any real chance to kill anyone.  
With that being said, considering all the above, her damage has to be ridiculous, otherwise why pick her when i can pick literally every other assassin. Hell zoe bursts faster, safer and harder while offering better utility. And she isnt even an assassin.
If any of what you said was true she wouldnt of had a retarded ban rate and a retarded good win rate
She had a good win rate because of {{item:3311}} . She's garbage tier without it (now even more garbage)

http://champion.gg/champion/Evelynn/Jungle?league=%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9%C2%95%C3%A6%C2%A0%C2%B9

Sicne the patch hit she has the highest ban rate of any jungler. Is sporting almost a 53 percent win rate and is averaging the most kills of any champion in league.

Stop

You do realize champion.gg has not updated for 8.2 yet? Even the page, right at the top still says, "*Patch 8.1*"

If you even click the "Probuild's" page, there's a break down of Pro's builds, and they still have {{item:3311}} Listed.
http://www.probuilds.net/champions/details/Evelynn

That's how Chaser got 20k gold in a game.

For the love of god. The point of this thread is for me to find out why she has such a big ban rate and winrate. She has counterplay ( more than she should in my opinion), she is not oppressive in anyway or form ( for an assassin ofc) so what with all this ruckus?
